description: This file appears to be a Python script that utilizes the 'agno' framework to create an agent with file handling capabilities, and performs a question-answering task related to language models, with some example code commented out.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using specified tools.

classes.name: FileTools
classes.description: A class providing file handling utilities.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to output a response, optionally in markdown format.
